casebody.data:
JANE PECHIN, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. THOMAS COLUMB, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Monell, Curtis, and Sedgwick, JJ.

Decided June 29, 1872. Appeal from a judgment entered on the report of a referee, in favor of the plaintiff in an action brought to reform a lease, and for a construction of the same. Jacob F. Miller, for appellant. Samuel Jones, for respondent. Judgment reversed.

Opinion by Cuetis, J., Monell and Sedgwick, JJ., concurring.
